DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Age 18+ year . 2 . Willing allow storage blood , breast milk , cell future research . 3 . Willing genetic testing perform . 4 . Meets one 3 follow criterion : 1 . Confirmed exposure : Exposure verifiably document ( eg , receive immunization DNCB sensitization treatment ) . AND Positive result establish clinical immunity test ( eg , viral RNA , antibody titer , etc ) . 2 . Suspected exposure : Clinical history consistent establish epidemiology microbe interest ( eg , travel endemic area , documentation past infection ) establish clinical assay exist verify exposure . 3 .
